subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Michael Wacha, 22, outdueled the Dodgers’ ace, Clayton Kershaw, the favorite to win the National League Cy Young Award, twice in the National League Championship Series.
snippet: Michael Wacha, 22, outdueled the Dodgers’ ace, Clayton Kershaw, the favorite to win the National League Cy Young Award, twice in the National League Championship Series.
